row.item_desc: <h3>Custom Background</h3> <p>Set your own custom background. — <strong>Important:</strong> You must have selected "<em>Custom</em>" in the above option in order to enable the following fields.</p>
<p><strong>Set a custom background for the page</strong></p>
<p><strong>Choose a background for the top menu</strong> or leave it blank if you want it to be the same as the page.</p>
<p><strong>Choose a custom background for the dark/contrasted sections</strong> or leave it blank to have the same page background everywhere.</p>
<p><strong>Select your preferred color scheme</strong> or select "<em>Custom</em>" and define your own custom colors bellow.<br />Default: <em>Blue</em></p>
<h3>Custom Colors</h3> <p>Set your own custom colors. — <strong>Important:</strong> You must have selected "<em>Custom</em>" in the above option in order to enable the following fields.</p>
<p><strong>Choose a color for the <u>text</u> of the current menu item</strong></p>

row.item_title: Top-border of the Active Menu Link
row.item_desc: <p><strong>Choose a color for the <u>top-border</u> of the current menu item</strong></p>
<p><strong>Choose a color for all the <u>links</u> within the page.</strong></p>

<p><strong>Choose a color for all the <u>links on a black background</u>.</strong></p>
<p>This color is used for the "<em>Contrasted</em>" and "<em>Black</em>" background versions. If you use the "<em>White</em>" version, this custom color won't be used.</p>

<p><strong>Upload your logo.</strong></br ><em>Expected image size</em>: 300×80 pixels</p>
<p>This is the first image displayed at the top left of the site. It is automatically replaced by a smaller version when the site is displayed on a mobile with a s small screen resolution (see bellow).</p>

row.item_title: Smaller version of your logo (50×50 pixels)

row.item_desc:
<p><strong>Upload a custom favicon.ico</strong><br />Image size: 16×16</p>
<p>This image is displayed in the browser's address bar.</p>

<p><strong>Upload a custom Apple Touch Icon</strong><br />Image size: 57×57</p>
<p>This image is used by Apple devices when the site is added as an application.</p>
<p><strong>Upload a custom Apple Touch Icon</strong><br />Image size: 72×72</p>
<p><strong>Upload a custom Apple Touch Icon</strong><br />Image size: 114×114</p>

<h1>Welcome Block</h1> <p>This is the first box displayed at the top of the landing-page, it includes a welcome text and a slider next to it. <strong>Insert it in your homepage using this shortcode:</strong> [welcome-block]</p>
<p><strong>Choose a speed for the transition animation between slides</strong></p>
<p><strong>Choose how much time to wait between each images</strong></p>
<p><strong>Choose either to show or hide the control buttons allowing to manually navigate between the slides</strong><br />Default: <em>Show</em></p>

<p><strong>Enter your main welcome title.</strong><br />Example: <em>&lt;h1&gt;Make it Yours&lt;/h1&gt;</em></p>
<p>Surround your title with the &lt;h1&gt; HTML tag. If you need to display smaller sized text (for longer title) then use &lt;h2&gt; or &lt;h3&gt; instead.</p>

<p><strong>Enter your email address</strong><br />Messages sent using the built-in contact form will be sent to your email.</p>
<p>Example: <em>your.name@example.com</em></p>

row.item_title: How to display the contact form?
row.item_desc:
<h3>How to display the contact form?</h3>
<p>Insert this shortcode anywhere in your pages/posts where you would like the contact form to appear: [contact-form]</p>

row.item_title: Display whatever you want in your footer
Page to display in the footer

row.item_desc:
<p><strong>Choose a page to display to users encountering a "404 Not Found" error</strong></p>
<p>Tip: Create a special page clearly indicating the error and offering other destinations like the homepage or the Blog category page.</p>
<p><strong>Insert a Google Analytics tracking code snippet</strong> or any other code snippet to be inserted in the body of the HTML document.</p>
<p><strong>Enter custom CSS</strong> <br /> This allows you to add custom CSS rules that will overwrite the existing ones.</p>
<p><strong>Choose a custom title for the landing-page</strong> or leave it blank for the WordPress's default title</p>
<p><strong>Enter a description for your site</strong><br />To be displayed in search results</p>
<p><strong>Enter keywords relevant to your site</strong></p>
<p><strong>Enter the website's author</strong></p>

<h3 id="doc-pricing-column">Styled-columns: Pricing Column</h3> <p>This is a specific shortcode to display a pricing-styled column. Default behavior is to display "one-third" columns, so you can put 3 columns together. If you would like to display 4 columns then set the attribute "display_four_columns" to 1.</p> <p>The icon attribute should be filled with the name of any image available in the /images/icons/ folder of the theme - don't forget to prefix with "white/" or "black/" which is the name of the folders containing the images. <em>Alternatively it also supports absolute URLs to images (i.e. http://example.com/image.jpg)</em></p>
<p><strong>Example:</strong><br /> <textarea> [pricing_column icon="black/cloud_icon&48.png" title="Cloud" amount=25 amount_detail="/mo" currency="€"] This section offers great possibilities to compare plans... [button featured=1 url="#"]Sign Up[/button] [/pricing_column] </textarea></p>
<p><strong>Full example of 3 pricing columns :</strong><br /> <textarea> [row class="add-more-bottom add-more-top"]
[pricing_column icon="black/cloud_icon&48.png" title="Cloud" amount=25 amount_detail="/mo"]
This section offers great possibilities to compare plans, products, subscriptions or to just price your services in a clear and distinguish way.
[ul] [li]Fast-loading[/li] [li]Browser History[/li] [li]Enterprise-level Website[/li] [li]Built for Performance[/li] [/ul]
[button featured=1 url="#contact"]Sign Up[/button]
[/pricing_column]
[pricing_column featured=1 icon="black/box_icon&48.png" title="Box" amount=35 amount_detail="/mo"]
This section offers great possibilities to compare plans, products, subscriptions or to just price your services in a clear and distinguish way.
[ul] [li]SEO Optimised[/li] [li]Grid System Layout[/li] [li]Focus on flow and conversions[/li] [li]Dynamic URL update[/li] [/ul]
[button featured=1 url="#contact"]Sign Up[/button]
[/pricing_column]
[pricing_column icon="black/dashboard_icon&48.png" title="Speed" amount=40 amount_detail="/mo"]
This section offers great possibilities to compare plans, products, subscriptions or to just price your services in a clear and distinguish way.
[ul] [li]Bookmarkable URLs[/li] [li]W3 Standards[/li] [li]Accessibility[/li] [li]Responsive Layout[/li] [/ul]
[button featured=1 url="#contact"]Sign Up[/button]
[/pricing_column]
[/row] </textarea></p>
<p><strong>Full example of 4 pricing columns :</strong><br /> <textarea> [row class="add-more-bottom add-more-top"]
[pricing_column display_four_columns=1 icon="black/cloud_icon&48.png" title="Cloud" amount=25 amount_detail="/mo"]
This section offers great possibilities to compare plans, products, subscriptions or to just price your services in a clear and distinguish way.
[ul] [li]Fast-loading[/li] [li]Browser History[/li] [li]Enterprise-level Website[/li] [li]Built for Performance[/li] [/ul]
[button featured=1 url="#contact"]Sign Up[/button]
[/pricing_column]
[pricing_column display_four_columns=1 featured=1 icon="black/box_icon&48.png" title="Box" amount=35 amount_detail="/mo"]
This section offers great possibilities to compare plans, products, subscriptions or to just price your services in a clear and distinguish way.
[ul] [li]SEO Optimised[/li] [li]Grid System Layout[/li] [li]Focus on flow and conversions[/li] [li]Dynamic URL update[/li] [/ul]
[button featured=1 url="#contact"]Sign Up[/button]
[/pricing_column]
[pricing_column display_four_columns=1 icon="black/dashboard_icon&48.png" title="Speed" amount=40 amount_detail="/mo"]
This section offers great possibilities to compare plans, products, subscriptions or to just price your services in a clear and distinguish way.
[ul] [li]Bookmarkable URLs[/li] [li]W3 Standards[/li] [li]Accessibility[/li] [li]Responsive Layout[/li] [/ul]
[button featured=1 url="#contact"]Sign Up[/button]
[/pricing_column]
[pricing_column display_four_columns=1 icon="black/dashboard_icon&48.png" title="Speed" amount=40 amount_detail="/mo"]
This section offers great possibilities to compare plans, products, subscriptions or to just price your services in a clear and distinguish way.
[ul] [li]Bookmarkable URLs[/li] [li]W3 Standards[/li] [li]Accessibility[/li] [li]Responsive Layout[/li] [/ul]
[button featured=1 url="#contact"]Sign Up[/button]
[/pricing_column]
[/row] </textarea></p>
<p>Other available attributes: <br /> display_four_columns=1 (makes the column smaller to fit 4 columns in a row)<br /> featured=1<br /> </p>
<h3 id="doc-icon-column">Styled-columns: Icon Column</h3> <p>This is a specific shortcode to display a one-third column with a floating image on the left of the text. Set the "bigtitle" optional attribute to 1 to display a bigger title.</p> <p>The icon attribute should be filled with the name of any image available in the /images/icons/ folder of the theme - don't forget to prefix with "white/" or "black/" which is the name of the folders containing the images. <em>Alternatively it also supports absolute URLs to images (i.e. http://example.com/image.jpg)</em></p>
<p><strong>Example:</strong><br /> <textarea> [row] [icon icon="white/home_icon&48.png" title="My Title"]My content here...[/icon] [icon icon="white/home_icon&48.png" title="Another Title"]My other content here...[/icon] [icon icon="white/home_icon&48.png" title="Example"]My content here...[/icon] [/row]</textarea> </p>
<p><strong>Example with bigger titles:</strong><br /> <textarea class="bigger"> [row] [icon icon="white/home_icon&48.png" bigtitle=1 title="My Title"]My content here...[/icon] [icon icon="white/home_icon&48.png" bigtitle=1 title="Another Title"]My other content here...[/icon] [icon icon="white/home_icon&48.png" bigtitle=1 title="Example"]My content here...[/icon] [/row] </textarea> </p>
